summary: This is an email exchange from December 5, 2019, where an individual requests that JP Morgan provide all SARs (Suspicious Activity Reports) and CTRs (Currency Transaction Reports) filed for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts. The email follows up after the recipient's vacation and Thanksgiving.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject whose financial accounts at JP Morgan are being inquired about, specifically regarding SARs and CTRs filed by the bank.

events.title: Request for Epstein's financial reports from JP Morgan
events.description: An email is sent requesting JP Morgan to provide all Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) and Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs) filed for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

keyFacts: A request was made on December 5, 2019, for JP Morgan to provide all SARs and CTRs filed for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.
The request indicates an ongoing interest or investigation into Epstein's financial activities at JP Morgan.
The email references the recipient's recent vacation and Thanksgiving, situating the request in late 2019.
